org.franca.deploymodel.core

Class FDeployRecursiveValidator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.franca.core.utils.AbstractFrancaValidator
      • org.franca.deploymodel.core.FDeployRecursiveValidator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IFrancaValidator

    public class FDeployRecursiveValidator
extends AbstractFrancaValidator
    Uses Xtext validators of Franca IDL and Franca deployment DSL to validate a Franca resource (*.fidl or *.fdepl). It will validate imported files recursively.
    Author:
    Klaus Birken (itemis)
